channel.title: Actors that make a film what it is...
channel.description:
So post actors that have made a film good or bad.
My few I've thought of so far.
Good: Alan Rickman in Die hard and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves. Jeff Bridges in The Big Lebowski and True Grit. Joe Pesci in Goodfellas and Casino. Gary Oldman in Léon and The Fifth Element.
Bad: Can't think of any, its hard to pinpoint an actor that makes a film bad in a bad film... or a good one!

item.description:
Rutger Hauer in Blade runner, the directors cut. I hate Harrison fords narration.

Keanu Reeves in Dracula. “I know where the bharstard sleeps” lol.

Ohh shii Gary Oldman is in… must watch this again.

item.title: Actors that make a film what it is...
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
The 60’s TV show wasn’t much more campy than the comic itself during that time.

Hell, most DC comics before the 70’s were fucking ridiculous.

item.source: Actors that make a film what it is...

item.title: Actors that make a film what it is...
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
danielsangeo:

If you’re unfamiliar with the Adam West 1960s Batman, it might come as a shock if you pull up the Cesar Romero’s Joker on something like Youtube. The Adam West 1960s Batman is brightly colored and very campy with very silly humor. Quite different from the darker and grittier modern Batman.

I’ve seen some of it, but I don’t remember any Joker episodes.

Then again, it was a loooooooooong time ago.

Read full topic

item.title: Actors that make a film what it is...
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
Billy Bob Thornton made Slingblade what it was. It’s almost hard to believe that’s him playing Carl.

I will say the same thing for Steve Martin in My Blue Heaven. It’s over the top, and should be unbelievable, but somehow Martin disappears in that one and makes it work.

Read full topic

item.title: Actors that make a film what it is...
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I thought Cruise did a good job in Minority Report. Great PKD adaptation, by the way.

As for Travolta, he was great in “Pulp Fiction.” Plus, the people that hate him get to see him take a suppressed Mac 10 mag to the face walking out of the john.

Read full topic

item.title: Actors that make a film what it is...
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
danielsangeo:

I didn’t like Face/Off, but not because of Nic Cage. Can’t stand John Travolta…in everything he’s in.

I liked Travolta in Get Shorty and Basic. Granted, most of his other movies are shit, but I like those two.
